item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Wednesday, February 12, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Derivative AT a Discontinuity (8 points | 2 comments)
3. How does a Linux machine connect to the internet, really? (13 points | 20 comments)

8. Your Network, Your Rules: Take Charge With Own DNS (7 points | no comments)
9. Delivering Malware Through Abandoned Amazon S3 Buckets (9 points | 5 comments)
10. Skip: A reactive framework to code declaratively and compute continuously (6 points | 5 comments)
11. HOTDOG: X11 Window Manager with Windows 3.1 Hot Dog Stand, Mac Classic and Aqua UI (23 points | 12 comments)
12. Do you use a debugger? (5 points | 4 comments)
13. Rust for Linux (13 points | 9 comments)

15. JJ cheat sheet (25 points | 7 comments)
16. Thomson Reuters wins an early court battle over AI, copyright, and fair use (12 points | 4 comments)
17. Reasoning models are just LLMs (5 points | no comments)
18. Writing my own dithering algorithm in Racket (38 points | no comments)
19. How I Automated My Computer Life With macOS Folder Actions (3 points | no comments)

21. Intensional Joy (a concatenative account of internal structure) (9 points | 3 comments)
22. Zodiac: simple Clojure framework (4 points | 2 comments)
23. Iteration in one language, then all the others (2016) (4 points | no comments)
24. llm-sort: Sort input lines semantically with LLMs (16 points | 7 comments)
25. A survey of every iterator variant (4 points | 1 comment)
